span.span: A listener for that writes events to the ETW subsystem.

summary.span: 关闭输出流，使它不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: Closes the output stream so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Delimiter { get; set; }
.property instance string Delimiter
Public Property Delimiter As String
public: property System::String ^ Delimiter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Delimiter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来对写入 ETW 子系统的事件数据进行分隔的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter used to delimit the event data that is written to the ETW subsystem.

value.span: 用来分隔事件数据的分隔符。

span.span: The delimiter used to delimit the event data.
The default delimiter is a comma.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 侦听器将数据元素转换为字符串，然后将字符串连接在一起，并使用指定的分隔符分隔字符串中的每个数据元素。The listener converts the data elements to strings and then concatenates the strings together, using the specified delimiter to delimit each data element in the string. 然后，在 ETW 子系统中将字符串编写为事件数据。The string is then written as the event data in the ETW subsystem. 若要成功分析字符串，使用者必须知道所使用的分隔符。To successfully parse the string, the consumer must know the delimiter that was used. 如果数据包含一个可能包含逗号的字符串，则指定相应的分隔符，以便正确分析事件数据。If the data contains a string that may contain a comma, specify an appropriate delimiter, so that the event data can be correctly parsed. 你不需要清单来使用侦听器中的事件，因为事件数据是单个字符串。You do not need a manifest to consume events from the listener because the event data is a single string. 分隔符适用于使用方法编写的事件数据 。The delimiter applies to event data written using the method.
